name: Treasure Island (itch) (jgilbert20@apu.edu)
description:
Treasure Island 

A game produced at APU by Jalen Gilbert

Description

My game “Treasure Island” is about an adventurer named Ace who is a treasure hunter. Ever since Ace was a child, his father who was also a treasure hunter, told Ace about a hidden island that holds money, jewels, and so many treasures that a person could dream of! His father was determined to find this mystery island and to be the richest man ever. Unfortunately, his father died before he could find this island and claim the treasure. At his father’s funeral, Ace made a promise to himself and to his dad to find this mystery island and become the world’s greatest treasure hunter. Because of this promise Ace has spent many years doing research and gathering as much information as he can. Then one day, he found the location of the mystery island and started his mission to find this treasure. 

Instructions

Controls: W, A, S, D, and SPACE to Jump. Walk up to the object to interact with it, and ALT+F4 is to exit the game.
